name: @gamely/prometheus-cli
description: Lua Obfuscator written in pure Lua (distributed as npm node-js)

scripts.prebuild: node scripts/copy.js && npx gly-cli bundler build/cli.lua && node scripts/bootstrap.js && node scripts/deflate.js
scripts.build: npx bun build --entrypoint src/cli.ts --target node --format cjs --outfile dist/cli.js --minify
scripts.postbuild: rm -Rf bin && mkdir -p bin && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > dist/header.txt && cat dist/header.txt dist/cli.js > bin/cli.js && chmod +x bin/cli.js
